data.name: Orwell: Ignorance is Strength - OST
data.detailed_description:
This is the official soundtrack for Orwell: Ignorance is Strength, the second season of the award-winning surveillance thriller, Orwell.

RELEASE SCHEDULE - 3 EPISODES OVER 4 WEEKS


Inspired by serialized drama, the game Orwell: Ignorance is Strength will be releasing as three bi-weekly episodes, starting February 22.

In turn, the official soundtrack for Orwell: Ignorance is Strength will also release in the same episodic format, with the tracks featured in episodes becoming available with the release of each episode. We strongly encourage you to purchase the game and play the episodes as they become available, then download the full soundtrack at the release of episode 3.

IMPORTANT NOTE: Purchasing the soundtrack gets you the official soundtrack for the whole season. You do NOT need to buy the episodic tracks seperately and the full soundtrack will be available for download with the final episode.

RELEASE SCHEDULE:

For Orwell: Ignorance Is Strength OST there are three episodes and there will be two weeks in between each.

Episode One: Thesis - 8am PST/5pm CET, Thursday February 22
1. Ignorance is Strength
2. Day 1
3. Tension
4. Thesis

Episode Two: Antithesis – 8am PST/5pm CET, Thursday March 8
5. Day 2
6. Antithesis

Episode Three: Synthesis – 8am PST/5pm CET, Thursday March 22
7. Day 3
8. Synthesis
9. Disintegration
10. Raban's Doctrine


Orwell: Ignorance is Strength Official Soundtrack full track Listing:
1. Ignorance is Strength
2. Day 1
3. Tension
4. Thesis
5. Day 2
6. Antithesis
7. Day 3
8. Synthesis
9. Disintegration
10. Raban's Doctrine

OST produced by The Otherworld Agency
Composed by feeding | ear

For more information about the game, Orwell: Ignorance is Strength, please visit the store page. http://store.steampowered.com/app/633060/Orwell_Ignorance_is_Strength/

data.short_description: This is the official soundtrack for Orwell: Ignorance is Strength, the second season of the award-winning surveillance thriller, Orwell.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP2+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU: DirectX 9 compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.10.5 or above
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU: OpenGL 3.2+
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS or above
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU: OpenGL 3.2+
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
